abstract: Joe Sharkey On The Road column on opposition by executives of plane manufacturers to calls for reducing some tax benefits for private planes; notes that manufacturers are thriving during downturn.
snippet: Executives of plane manufacturing companies attacked calls to reduce some tax benefits for private planes.
lead_paragraph: Executives of plane manufacturing companies attacked calls to reduce some tax benefits for private planes.

headline.main: A Dark Mood Surrounds Corporate Jet Makers
headline.seo: A Dark Mood Surrounds Corporate Jet Makers
headline.print_headline: A Dark Mood Surrounds Corporate Jet Makers
